greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 2^(n-1) mod semiprime(n).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {semip = select(n->bigomega(n) == 2, vector(nn, i, i)); for (i=1, #semip, print1(2^(i-1) % semip[i], ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2013
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 02 2010
